name: Alien Road (Kronya, Mitaine Féroce, Warpboy9, AntoBerthiaume)
name_original: Alien Road (Kronya, Mitaine Féroce, Warpboy9, AntoBerthiaume)
description:
A game made by students for Brackeys Game Jam 2022

As you were investigating possibilities of alien life in area 51, you stumbled into one of them inviting itself onto your car. Little did you know, you suddenly are being pursued by its comrades! Flee as far as you can by resolving odd occurrences all around you.

Lead Programmer: Gabriel Brazeau

Programmer & UI Artist: Sandie D. Leitao

Character & 3D Artist: Félix Godbout et Moises Henriquez

3D & Texture Artist: Antoine Berthiaume

Voice Actress: Abigail Adair

Thank you for playing!

Let us know how far you got in the comments below! :)

Inspired by games such as Five Nights at Freddy's and Rides with Strangers
